message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $175. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at an above-market value.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $175 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $140 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After considering your proposal, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer the product to you for $155.
Alice, $155 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $150.  That's my final offer.
